neighbors.name: Aron R Peace & Crystal Monique Peace
neighbors.claims: County assessor records list Aron R and Crystal M. Peace as owners of multiple agricultural parcels south of Locust Grove ([DataCrosspoint](https://www.datacrosspoint.com/mayes-county-property-search/)). No references were found of the Peace family voicing opinions on local development in public meetings or media.

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respected local farm leader reach out to discuss how the project will protect farmland and honor land stewardship, addressing any concerns about preserving their agricultural property.

citations.claim: County assessor records list Aron R and Crystal M. Peace as owners of multiple agricultural parcels south of Locust Grove
citations.title: Mayes County Assessor Property Search

neighbors.verification_notes: Verified ownership via county records portal. No public stance found in local news or meeting minutes.

neighbors.name: Michael B. Lewis Jr.
neighbors.claims: Michael B. Lewis Jr. is recorded as the owner of a rural Mayes County property near Locust Grove, according to county land records ([DataCrosspoint](https://www.datacrosspoint.com/mayes-county-property-search/)). There is no record of Lewis Jr. making public comments about local development or energy projects in available county meetings or news archives.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage him through a trusted local agricultural figure to reassure that the development will respect farmland and could bring benefits without harming property interests or the land’s future value.

citations.claim: Michael B. Lewis Jr. is recorded as the owner of a rural Mayes County property near Locust Grove
citations.title: Mayes County Assessor Property Search

neighbors.verification_notes: Verified ownership via county records portal. No public stance found. Personal legal records found for name match but excluded per privacy/relevance policy.

neighbors.name: Sandra Vaughn
neighbors.claims: Sandra Vaughn appears in county assessor records as the owner of a parcel in Mayes County’s rural area ([DataCrosspoint](https://www.datacrosspoint.com/mayes-county-property-search/)). No evidence was found of Vaughn taking any public stance or speaking at local meetings regarding development or renewable energy issues.

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in person or via a community gathering, emphasizing respect for the rural character and explaining how the project will co-exist with farming and preserve the quiet countryside she values.

citations.claim: Sandra Vaughn appears in county assessor records as the owner of a parcel in Mayes County’s rural area
